articles.description: Brisbane company Ellume has developed the first at-home, non-prescriptive test for COVID-19 that has been approved for use in the US and can return results in as little as 20 minutes.
articles.content:
A new at-home coronavirus test, developed by a Brisbane company, has been approved for emergency use in the United States.
Key points:

articles.title: High-flying fashion startup Mon Purse collapses after COVID-19 woes - Sydney Morning Herald
articles.description: Former high-flying fashion startup Mon Purse has appointed liquidators, leaving a string of prominent investors in the lurch.
